Nice collection of Sovereigns! On the Wajo portrait, are the scuffs in the head area on the card surface or case?
Its not scuffing. It is extra ink streaks on the card.
Young is sold.  Dropped prices on other three
I see the Johnson is already up for sale on ebay for 5495.  Took a whole day.

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=1809008]I see the Johnson is already up for sale on ebay for 5495.  Took a whole day.[/QUOTE]

If by a whole day, you mean a week, then yes.

[quote name="wilkiebaby11" post=1809030]If by a whole day, you mean a week, then yes.[/QUOTE]

Perhaps he also thought the Johnson was the one that sold and someone was tying to flip? And not just you also listing on eBay? 

It's obviously the Young that sold... to me and I'm keeping... thanks Steve it looks great!
that is a great looking Young, congrats!

[quote name="wilkiebaby11" post=1809030]If by a whole day, you mean a week, then yes.[/QUOTE]


Yes thought it was purchased and immediately flipped.  Good luck with the sale on ebay.
